Description:
Perfect for those starting out, investing or downsizing....
Set in an ideal and sought-after location in Craigieburn, this well-presented home has a lot to offer first homebuyers, investors or those looking to downsize. With a tastefully designed exterior you will be impressed with the open plan living which includes heating & cooling, kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/living area, large master bedroom with built in robes, main bathroom with double vanity, open study/sitting area which could easily be converted to a 3rd bedroom, high ceilings and much more. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. This home really does offer a blend of low maintenance living, without comprising on space or comfort and with all the amenities close by including shopping centres, public transport & schools. Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!
Insights: 15 Dempster Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovation Unfinished
The Phone Code for this property is: 84850. Please quote this number when phoning or texting.
House for Sale
In a position that could not be any more perfect, this property is close to public transport including train station, walking distance to supermarket and more.
Selling house half way through renovation. This house is perfect for someone wanting to take over unfinished renovation. Most major work on the inside is almost complete.
Comprising.....
* Open plan living
* Three bedrooms.... 2 with built in wardrobes
* One bathroom with toilet...shower over bath tub
* Seperate Toilet
Features include; open plan meals area with adjoining family area, ducted heating, plenty of lawn, timber floors and garage.
Land Size: 643 sqm
Inspections by appointment only contact

Description:
Where Quality Matters!!!
Overflowing with character, charm and luxury finishes under soaring ceilings, this single-level 4 bedroom home sets an exacting standard for modern family living in the ever-popular Craigieburn's Aston estate. Convenience has never been so affordable with Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, local schools, childcare facilities, medical centres, restaurants, Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre, Hume Library, park-lands and transport all nearby.
Discover an idyllic family layout with every angle boasting in natural sunlight, offering space to lounge, dine and entertain. A wonderfully open and airy living and dining area on sleek, complemented by a sparkling kitchen, ideally set up for entertaining with a handy walk-in pantry equipped with waterfall featured 40mm stone bench-tops, tiled splash-back, 900mm freestanding stainless-steel cook-top and dishwasher at your disposal.
Enjoy a palatial main bedroom boasting a luxurious ensuite with double basins, extremely large shower, tiles to ceilings, separate WC and roomy walk-in-robes, while the remaining trio of robed bedrooms are serviced by a sparkling central bathroom with a relaxing bath and walk-in shower.
Comprehensive features include a large laundry, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, remote-controlled double garage with internal/external access, high ceilings, alfresco, colorbond fencing and a landscaped garden and yard, perfect for family fun. Representing real value with flawless finishes and fixtures, this one will not last long!
Insights: 1 Scenery Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Excellence with Indoor Style & Outdoor Space
In a family-focused Highlands neighbourhood with parkland at either end of the street, this
freestanding 3 bedroom home delivers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle of contemporary quality, floorplan flexibility & urban practicality.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's inviting interior comprises a master
bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes) & spotless central bathroom. Dual living zones include a separate lounge & spacious open-plan family/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen complete with stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other features include ducted heating & split-system air-conditioning, additional ceiling fans (all bedrooms), instantaneous hot water, family-sized laundry, plus a surprisingly large backyard, internally-accessed double garage (remote-controlled) as well as a wide sideway with potential for additional off-street parking.
Moments from both Thorngrove Reserve and Watermill Reserve, it's also close to Malcolm
Creek trails, public transport, popular primary & secondary schools as well as a choice of
shopping centres.
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn
Insights: 37 Thorngrove Avenue, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy.
If you are looking for that perfect first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go. Just a few of the features on hand include renovated kitchen with granite bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, adjoining meals/family room, formal lounge, ducted heating & split system cooling, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, main bathroom, double lock up garage and much more. All set on a very large allotment with drive through and side access leading to the HUGE tradesman work shop measuring 6.6m x 7.5m providing you with endless options as far as storage for the boat, extra cars, caravan or trailer. There is also the opportunity for the smart builder/developer offering great potential to re develop (subject to council approval) in a great location & on a block of 672m2 (approximately). Whatever your requirements may be this property offers endless opportunities. Ideally located right in the heart of Craigieburn within close distance to the Craigieburn train station, shopping plaza, schools and shops. Don't let this opportunity pass you by. This one won't hang around for long. Call now for inspection...

Description:
5 BEDROOMS WITH PANARAMIC CITY VIEWS
Situated in the prestigious Mt Ridley estate, this timeless residence features multiple living areas, an array of bedroom accommodation and great entertaining zones that will suit the large or extended family. With a commanding street frontage and spectacular city views, this immaculately presented family residence is one you will have to see.
Sizeable bedrooms include downstairs guest room which makes the idyllic retreat for the elderly, visitors or teenage kids, as it is complemented by downstairs powder room with shower. Deluxe master suite with a sparking ensuite and walk in robes, further enhances the homes sleeping quarters.
Offering multiple formal and informal living zones including sophisticated living / dining area, fireside lounge room and upstairs retreat which opens onto a balcony that boasts uninterrupted city views.
The superb cooking arena overlooks outdoor dining area, completed with a built in BBQ and wood fire oven, perfect for entertaining on those summer nights. Situated on a mammoth 755m2 approx corner allotment, there is ample scope for a swimming pool or workshop.
Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double garage with space for work benches, drive through access for boats trailers and caravans and much more.
Positioned only minutes to Hume Fwy, Grand Blvd Café, Craigieburn Primary, Mt Ridley College, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary, Hume Grammar and all other important amenities Craigieburn has to offer.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
Insights: 16 Crestmont Terrace, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Fresh Beginnings Don't Come Better Than This!
Situated to perfection with absolutely everything at your doorstep, enter this super stylish & affordable home that has all the hard work done for you to just simply move in & enjoy. Whether you are a first home buyer, downsizer or savvy investor, this will tick all the boxes on your must-have wish list.
The clean & very flexible floorplan comprises 3 great size rooms with built-in robes, master with full ensuite & walk-in robe, hostess kitchen with ample cupboard & bench space, sun-drenched open plan living & meals area which will be sublime for all those large-scale family gatherings.
Freeing up your time & all the hassle out of the weekend gardening, the home comes equipped with low maintenance front garden, expansive open space out the back for kids to play, covered alfresco & features ducted heating, evaporative cooling, single garage with internal access, sparkling central bathroom, roomy laundry & much much more! Neat, sweet and complete, check this out before it's too late!
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
Lifestyle Perfection with Every Indulgence
Intelligent design, premium inclusions & meticulous attention to detail highlight the appeal of this single-level showpiece delivering an aspirational family environment of uncompromised quality, privacy & versatility.
Fully-optioned with nothing to do but simply move in & enjoy, the home's first-class interior boasts four large bedrooms, three with walk-in robes (large master with walk-in robe & deluxe ensuite), equally-stylish main bathroom, separate lounge/TV room & vast open-plan living/dining area leading out to low maintenance & immaculate back garden.
Other stand-out features include a gourmet kitchen with quality appliances & ample cupboard space, walk-in pantry, large laundry & internally-accessed double remote control garage, plus ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, 2.7m ceilings, heightened doors, stone benchtops throughout, efficient LED down-lights & stylish fittings. Call now and make this sensational Brand New Home your very own!
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
Affordable Style with Every Highlands Advantage
Situated in an established neighbourhood with excellent convenience to all amenities, this contemporary home presents a value-packed entry into Highlands making it ideal for first-time buyers, young families & downsizers alike.
Impeccably-presented interior comprises 3 bedrooms (all with built-in robes), stylish master ensuite, main family bathroom & separate toilet. Add to this a spacious open-plan living/dining area & accompanying kitchen complete with breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other features include ducted heating & split-system air conditioner, internally-accessed garage, plus stacker doors (from the living area) leading out to an al-fresco entertaining area & private back garden.
Walking distance to Cross Keys Reserve, Malcolm Creek Park & endless trails, it's close to public transport & Highlands Shopping Centre, easy access to Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
Style, Space and Family Flexibility Moments from the Lake
Positioned to perfection in Highlands' most sought-after pocket, this contemporary home stands out from the crowd with its expansive single-level design, long list of features & unbeatable convenience with lakeside parkland at the end of the street.
Beyond the distinctive facade, discover an inviting interior comprising a large master bedroom with walk-in robe private ensuite with double vanity, 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes) & study/home office, stylish central bathroom & separate WC. Add to this a light-filled lounge & spacious open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a
stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, Bosch dishwasher & ample
cupboard space.
High ceilings throughout further add to the home's appeal along with ducted heating &
evaporative cooling, alarm system & a large family-sized laundry. Stacker doors from the living area reveal an al-fresco entertaining deck and wonderfully wide backyard garden, plus remote-control double garage.
An outstanding family lifestyle opportunity, it's also close to Craigieburn Central Shopping
Centre, popular schools & childcare facilities, endless walking/cycling trails as well as public transport & major arterials.

Description:
Beautiful Family Home Or Great Investment
Located in a great and convenient location, this home will tick all your boxes. This home offers 3 bedrooms with BIR'S, master with ensuite and walk in robes, open plan kitchen with meals/living area, central bathroom, double remote garage with internal/external access and undercover entertainment area. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar system, downlights, dishwasher, stone bench tops, ample cupboard space, walk in pantry and good size backyard. Within close proximity to Mount Ridley College, childcare facilities, shopping centre, sporting grounds, splash, public transport and much more.
Whether you a buying to live in or for an investment this great opportunity is one not to be missed. Inspection is a must!
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Position & Potential
This lovely home is set out on 663m2 (approx.) allotment perfect for the smart/ developer (subject to council approval) and also ideal for a family home.
Consisting of 3 bedrooms, main with ensuite, separate lounge, kitchen-meals area, central bathroom, carport and outdoor entertainment area.
The location is hard to beat with just a short distance to all amenities including, Craigieburn Central, Craigieburn train station, Craigieburn Primary, Craigieburn Secondary, Craigieburn Plaza and easy access to CBD via Hume Highway and Hume Freeway.
This property is currently tenanted with a rental income generating $1521 per Calendar Month.
Call Leanne 0406 730 775 today to book an inspection.
